Name: Isles of Pangaea
About the game: Isles of Pangaea is a game where you can play and experience the life of different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Play as herbivores, carnivores, piscivores, land-dwellers, swimmers, and flyers from various parts of the ecosystem. Play by yourself in singleplayer mode or play with other people from around the world in multiplayer mode. Both modes of play feature AI dinosaurs that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you. The goal of the game is to survive. Currently there are a couple of ways you can customize your creature. One way is to earn experience points by eating food, killing other creatures, and completing tasks, and then spend those experience points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health. Another way is that each species can collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen individual dinosaurs, dinosaurs around your nest, or your spawned eggs. ðŸ”¹ 43 playable species include: Ankylosaurus, Archelon, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Dilophosaurus, Dimetrodon, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Pteranodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Tryannosaurus, Velociraptor, Argentinosaurus, Baryonyx, Carnotaurus, Gallimimus, Iguanodon, Kentrosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Protoceratops, Styracosaurus, Troodon, Dimorphodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Ammonite, Anomalocaris, Cameroceras, Dunkleosteus, Elasmosaurus, Helicoprion, Ophthalmosaurus, Leedsichthys, Megalodon, Tylosaurus, Onchopristis, Xenacanthus, Meganeura, Titanoboa, and Trilobite.
